fields.name: Jurisdiction
fields.title: Jurisdiction
fields.description: The jurisdiction in which the voter is registered

fields.name: IsUocava
fields.title: Is UOCAVA
fields.description: Indicates whether the voter is UOCAVA or domestic absentee

fields.name: VoterType
fields.title: Voter Type
fields.description: Specifies whether the voter is military, overseas citizen, or other

fields.name: MailingCountry
fields.title: Mailing Country
fields.description: Specifies what country to which the ballot was mailed

fields.name: RequestReceivedDate
fields.title: Request Received Date
fields.description: Specifies the date the request was received by the local or state election official

fields.name: RequestMode
fields.title: Request Mode
fields.description: Specifies the method by which the request was received

fields.name: RequestProcessedDate
fields.title: Request Processed Date
fields.description: Specifies the date the request was processed by the local or state election official

fields.name: BallotMailedDate
fields.title: Ballot Mailed Date
fields.description: Specifies the date the ballot was mailed to the voter by the local or state election official

fields.name: DeliveryMode
fields.title: Delivery Mode
fields.description: Specifies the method in which the ballot was sent to the voter

fields.name: BallotReturnedDate
fields.title: Ballot Returned Date
fields.description: Specifies the date the ballot was returned or received by the local or state election official

fields.name: BallotReturnMode
fields.title: Ballot Return Mode
fields.description: Specifies the method by which the ballot was returned to the local or state election official

fields.name: ApplicationRequestType
fields.title: Application Request Type
fields.description: Specifies the type of ballot application request

fields.name: WasFpcaRejected
fields.title: Was FPCA Rejected
fields.description: Specifies whether the Federal Postcard Application was accepted or rejected

fields.name: FpcaRejectionComments
fields.title: FPCA Rejection Comments
fields.description: Comments on why the Federal Postcard Application was rejected

fields.name: WasBallotRejected
fields.title: Was Ballot Rejected
fields.description: Specifies whether the ballot was accepted or rejected

fields.name: BallotRejectionType
fields.title: BallotRejectionType
fields.description: Specifies the reason why the ballot was rejected

fields.name: BallotType
fields.title: Ballot Type
fields.description: Specifies the type of ballot transferred to the voter
